description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) solicits Standing Offers for the supply and delivery of Fiberglass Insulation for use by Correctional Services of Canada.
full_summary:
### 21C11-234792-A Request for Standing Offer

**Reference Number:** WS4023710728-Doc4345103605
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** WS4023710728

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-08

#### Tender Closing Date:
The Standing Offer solicitation will close on **2024-01-23T14:00:00**.

#### Contractual Details
* **Estimated Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-25
* **Estimated Contract End Date:** 2029-04-30

#### Solicitation Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)’s CORCAN program invites interested suppliers to submit a Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of Fiberglass Insulation to various locations in Canada.

#### Solicitation Summary

* This Standing Offer will be used to supply and deliver Fiberglass Insulation to CSC facilities across Canada on an as-and-when requested basis.
* The Standing Offer will have a duration of approximately 5 years.
* Suppliers may be awarded more than one Standing Offer as a result of this Solicitation.

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-23T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-01-16

#### Solicitation Terms and Conditions

* **True North Strong and Free Free Trade Agreement (TNST option 1):** Eligible
* **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA):** Eligible
* **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP):** Eligible
* **Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA):** Eligible

#### Regional Delivery

* **Nova Scotia**
* **National Capital Region (NCR)**
* **Quebec (except NCR)**
* **New Brunswick**
* **Ontario (except NCR)**

#### Point of Contact

* Caroline Wolszczan, SPAC/PSPC
* [caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: [–*later update]
* Fax: [–*later update]
